mods.note: Sheet music of a Civil War era song written and published in the Confederate States of America. The song was composed and dedicated to the "Songs of the South". The "flag as it is" in this version now has 11 stars, rather than the 7 of the first version. Kentucky and Tennessee Join Hands. Huber is the composer, Lyle is the lyricist, and additional publishers include A.E. Blackmar and Bro. in Vicksburg and New Orleanes, J.H. Snow in Mobile, AL, and P.P. Werlein and Halsey in New Orleans.
The University of Tennessee Libraries (Knoxville, Tennessee) is the digital publisher.
